name: Oriel STAT A MATRIX
goal: Oriel STAT A MATIX goal is to participate in the policies and activities within the European Union commission particular to the healthcare industry.  We are an independent group of subject matter experts involved in understanding guidelines and interpretation of regulations for health care industry.  These include the involvement in European policy making, guidance documents, and interpretation of regulations.
euInitiatives: We provide consultancy to the medical device industry for compliance with activities associated with the Medical Device Regulation and In Vitro Regulation.  The expectation is to interact, link, and have activities with Medical Device Coordination Group (MDCG) which are responsible for Working Groups and those areas of policy for healthcare industry.
